long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Never lose important copied content again! ClipKeeper is a powerful, intuitive clipboard manager that enhances productivity by automatically saving everything you copy. Access your clipboard history anytime, and quickly reuse text, links, and more with just a click.

Features:
- Instant access to all copied content with a simple click.
- Copy link text or URLs directly by right-clicking on any hyperlink.
- Easily clear your clipboard history for better organization.
- Works seamlessly with popular websites like Wikipedia, capturing both link text 
  and URLs.
- Stay organized and streamline your workflow with ClipKeeper!
